mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.`code`, f.major_code, f.sub_system_code, f.fault_applicant, (select group_concat(device_code) from fault_device where fault_code = f.`code`) as deviceCode, ( select group_concat(d.name) from (select device_code from fault_device where fault_code = f.`code`) a left join device d on d.`code` = a.device_code) as deviceName, f.station_code, f.station_position_code, f.fault_phenomenon, f.happen_time, frr.fault_analysis, f.appoint_user_name, frr.maintenance_measures as solution, da.device_type_code as deviceTypeCode, da.`code` as materialCode FROM fault f left join fault_repair_record frr on frr.fault_code = f.`code` left join fault_device fd on fd.fault_code = f.`code` left join device_assembly da on da.`code` = fd.device_code where frr.del_flag = 0 and fd.del_flag = 0 and f.id = #{id}
select fault_code from fault_analysis_report where del_flag = 0
